colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,RANG GI RTZA BA'I BLA MA RDO RJE 'CHANG GRUB MCHOG DHARMA BADZRA DANG, KUN MKHYEN DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME DPAL BZANG PO RNAM PA GNYIS KYIS MDZAD PA'I GTOR MCHOG BSDUS PA GNYIS PHAN TSUN KUN SGRIGS SHING MTSAMS SBYOR CI RIGS PAS BRGYAN TE, BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI BKA' DRIN LAS BSTAN BSRUNG RGYAL MO 'DI NYID KYI GDAMS PA ZAB MO MANG DU THOS PA'I RGYAL KHAMS PA ^DAM TSIG RDO RJES 'KHYER BDE BAR SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG DPAL LDAN LHA MO DGYES BZHIR RJES SU BZUNG STE BYANG CHUB SGRUB PA'I GROGS MDZAD PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
